author: dildick
body:
The static analyzer of the latest IB shows quite a few issues with the CSCTriggerPrimitives code. I tried to address them in this pull request
* `static bool` was replaced by `static std::atomic<bool>`. this applies to all occurrences of `config_dumped`
* instances where `std::cout` was placed at the end of an `edm::LogDebug` were replaced by `std::endl` (shouldn't the compiler pick this up?)
* a few instances of local `static` variables in functions were made `const` instead where variables do not change after declaration
* 2D vector patterns in `CSCComparatorDigiFitter` were declared `const`

In addition, I removed `gemCustoms.py` in `SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration` since it is no longer used. Finally, all specific customization functions in `gemGeometryCustoms.py` are outdated and were removed.
title: Fix issues reported by static analyzer in CSCTriggerPrimitives
